warezcdn.name: Dragon Ball GT
warezcdn.title: Dragon Ball GT: Doragon bôru jîtî

imdb.title: Dragon Ball GT: Doragon bôru jîtî
imdb.plot: After Goku is made a kid again by the Black Star Dragon Balls, he goes on a journey to get back to his old self.

episodes.title: A Grand Problem
episodes.plot: While trapped by the Sigma Force, Goku and Pan reflect on the circumstances that led up to their current battle. This is a composition episode that was aired in place of the first 16 episodes of this series during its first run in the United States.

episodes.title: Nazo no Dragon Ball Shutsugen!! Gokuu ga Kodomo ni!?
episodes.plot: Start of the "Ultimate Dragon Balls/Black Star Saga". After finishing his training with Uub, Goku is turned into a child by a careless wish from Emperor Pilaf, who has summoned the eternal dragon using the black star dragon balls. Afterward, Goku, while re-adjusting to life as a kid, learns that if he doesn't find the black star balls, which are now scattered across the galaxy, in one year's time, the earth will be destroyed. Also, Pan stops a bank robbery.

episodes.title: Shuyaku wa Watashi! Pan Uchuu ni Tobitatsu!!
episodes.plot: Trunks grows bored with being the President of Capsule Corporation. Chi-Chi, Gohan, and Videl convince Goku to retrieve the black star dragon balls himself, and Gohan announces his plans to join his father. Bulma, Gohan, and Videl work on the spaceship. Pan resents being treated like a kid and not being allowed to go with Goku, and she spends time with Mr. Satan. Thinking that he is Bulma's and Vegeta's kid, two thugs who are hoping for a ransom "kidnap" Goku; Vegeta recruits Trunks and Goten to join Goku on his mission.

episodes.title: Chou Gametsui!! Shounin no Wakusei Imegga
episodes.plot: Due to a broken part on the spaceship, Goku, Trunks, and Pan crash-land on the planet Imecka, where everything seems to be expensive.

episodes.title: Wanted!! Gokuu ga Shimei Tehai!?
episodes.plot: Still on Imecka, Goku, Trunks, and Pan try to retrieve their ship from Lord Don Kee's palace.

episodes.title: Tsuyoi Yatsu Mikke!! Youjinbou Ledgic
episodes.plot: Goku, Trunks, and Pan continue to evade the royal forces on Imecka. After eating with an elderly couple, they go to Don Kee's palace, and Goku fights Ledgic, Don Kee's personal bodyguard.

episodes.title: Chotto Itee zo!? Gokuu no Haisha
episodes.plot: Goku, Trunks, and Pan land on a planet where everything is gigantic. While looking for the dragon ball that is on that planet, Pan gets captured by a swarm of bees who think that she is their queen.

episodes.title: Itoshi no Honey!? Hanayome wa Trunks
episodes.plot: Goku, Trunks, and Pan land on a planet that has another dragon ball. They find it in a village that is being terrorized by Zoonama, a wicked monster that can cause earthquakes by vibrating his whiskers. The village agrees to give up the dragon ball in exchange for ridding them of Zoonama before he takes one of the village women away as his bride.

episodes.title: Gokuu mo Dokkan!! Ohige Power Zenkai
episodes.plot: Zoonama takes Trunks back to his lair, and Goku, Pan, and Doma follow them so that they can put a stop to the monster's wickedness once and for all.

episodes.title: Shimatta!! Gokuu Tobikomu Wana no Hoshi!?
episodes.plot: Goku, Pan, and Trunks chase after the Para Para Brothers, who stole one of their dragon balls. Losing them inside a planet filled with caves, the Para Para Brothers return to their base to give the dragon ball to Cardinal Mutchy Mutchy as the others try to find their way off the planet.

episodes.title: Odotte Attack!? Bonpappa!!
episodes.plot: Goku, Trunks, and Pan fight a family of giant worms and the Para Para Brothers, who have returned to collect the dragon ball they missed, on Beehey, the planet filled with caves.

episodes.title: Luud no Noroi!? Ningyou ni Sareta Pan
episodes.plot: Pan lands on planet Luud and looks for the dragon ball as Goku and Trunks go after her.

episodes.title: Kami no Otsuge wa Chou Meiwaku!! Luud Kidou
episodes.plot: Goku and Trunks fight Mutchy as Master Dolltaki gains power for Lord Luud's resurrection from his followers.

episodes.title: Koitsu ga Oyadama!? Nazo no Kagakusha Myuu
episodes.plot: Goku and Trunks fight Luud as Dolltaki plays with his Pan doll and reports to his boss, Dr. Myuu.

episodes.title: Rhythm de Bacchiri!? Luud Kouryaku!!
episodes.plot: Goku and Trunks fight Luud on the outside while Pan fights him on the inside.

episodes.title: Mou Gurete Yaru!! Pan no Iede!?
episodes.plot: Goku, Pan, and Trunks land on a desert planet. Feeling rejected because Trunks wants to drop her off on Earth, Pan, to prove her worth, searches for the dragon ball that is on the planet while Goku and Trunks work on the spaceship. Also, Giru searches for Pan, who gets lost. Meanwhile, Dolltaki goes to report to Dr. Myuu, but instead he is met by General Rilldo, Myuu's right-hand man.

episodes.title: Machine Wakusei M2... Uragiri no Giru
episodes.plot: Goku, Pan, Trunks, agree to land on Giru's home planet so that he can reminisce, but when they get there they find that the planet, completely populated by robots, may not be as friendly as they were led to believe.

episodes.title: Pan ni Omakase! Gokuu Kyuushutsu Sakusen!!
episodes.plot: Start of the "Baby Saga". Attempting to save Goku and Trunks, Pan sneaks into the robots' compound and fights Nat, a member of the Sigma Force. Meanwhile, General Rilldo uses Giru to view the fighting data of Goku, Trunks, and Pan.

episodes.title: Data nya Nai ze! Gokuu no Chouhonki
episodes.plot: Goku fights the Sigma Force while Trunks takes Pan back to the ship.

episodes.title: Shutsujin!! Saikyou Mutant - Rirudo
episodes.plot: Goku fights General Rilldo as Pan searches for Trunks, who was frozen in metal and transmitted to Dr. Myuu by Rilldo.

episodes.title: Tamageta zo!! Gokuu o Osou Kinzoku Tsunami
episodes.plot: Goku fights Meta-Rilldo as Pan continues to make her way through the compound.

episodes.title: Nante Kotta!! Kinzokuban ni Natta Gokuu
episodes.plot: Goku and Pan are captured by General Rilldo and are taken to Dr. Myuu's lab so that he can harness their Saiyan power for his fiendish plan.

episodes.title: Abakareta Yabou!! Jaaku Seimeitai Baby
episodes.plot: Dr. Myuu's evil plan to take over the galaxy using Baby, the infant mutant machine that he created, is revealed. Also, Myuu tries to revive Baby, whose life support has been disconnected by Trunks.

episodes.title: Kakusareta Kiki!? Nanpasen to Nazo no Shounen
episodes.plot: After narrowly escaping General Rilldo, who had been taken over by Baby, Goku, Trunks, and Pan leave planet M2. They find a dragon ball on the wreckage of a ship, which they must retrieve before the ship is sucked into a star.

episodes.title: Baby Gyakushuu!! Nerawareta Saiya-jin!!
episodes.plot: Goku, Trunks, and Pan wait at the hospital while Baby, staying undercover while using other bodies as his vessel, plans a way to take over their bodies.

episodes.title: Taihen Da!! Chikyuu ni Baby ga Arawareta
episodes.plot: Vegeta shaves his mustache because Bulla thinks it looks stupid. Bulma and Chi-Chi hope for the safety of Goku, Pan, and Trunks. Goten goes on a date. Goku, Pan, and Trunks find a dragon ball near a sleeping tiger-like creature. Baby arrives on Earth and begins taking over people's bodies, and, after being challenged by Mr. Satan, he fights Goten.

episodes.title: Gohan to Goten... Saiaku no Kyoudaigenka!?
episodes.plot: After possessing Goten, Baby looks for Vegeta, but first he must go through Gohan, who recognizes that something has taken control of his brother. Also, Goku, Trunks, and Pan find a dragon ball inside of a dinosaur, and they throw a party for themselves.

episodes.title: Yabou Kansei!? Nottorareta Vegeta
episodes.plot: Gohan and Goten, both having been possessed by Baby, fight Vegeta, who is returning home after shopping with Bulla. Bulma, Videl, and Chi-Chi worry about Goten. Baby reveals his history. Goku, Trunks, and Pan find the last dragon ball on a snow-covered planet.

episodes.title: Gokuu Kaeru... Chikyuu wa Zenbu Ora no Teki!?
episodes.plot: Goku, Trunks, and Pan return to Earth, and, after dropping off the dragon balls at the Lookout, they find that everyone on Earth has been taken over by Baby. Also, Mr. Satan hides inside Majin Buu.

episodes.title: Chouyabai!? Super Saiya-jin 3 Yabureru!!
episodes.plot: Goku fights Baby-Vegeta.

episodes.title: Gokuu Shoumetsu!? Ora wa Shinjimatta Da
episodes.plot: Baby-Vegeta uses the black star dragon balls to wish back Planet Vegeta into Earth's orbit. Pan mourns Goku; Goku, somehow not dead from Baby-Vegeta's blast, is trapped in an alternate dimension, and he plays a game with Sugoro, the dimension's ruler, for his life.

episodes.title: Atto Odoroku!? Sugoroku Kuukan Daihoukai
episodes.plot: When Goku realizes that Sugoro is cheating, he must escape the dimension before the dimension's caretakers, who aren't pleased that Sugoro has been cheating all this time, destroy it. Also, Majin Buu, Pan, and Mr. Satan sneak onto a ship bound for planet Vegeta, and Kibito Kai and Old Kai agree to train Goku for his battle with Baby.

episodes.title: Gokuu o Kaese!! Ikari no Senshi Uub
episodes.plot: Uub fights Baby as Old Kai tries to bring out Goku's tail.

episodes.title: Kurae Baby! Shinsei Uub Hissatsu Kousen!!
episodes.plot: Majuub fights Baby, and, after Old Kai finishes bringing out his tail, Goku joins the battle.

episodes.title: Henshin Shippai!? Gokuu no Oozaru Ooabare!!
episodes.plot: Goku, now a Super Saiyan Great Ape with no control over his power, goes on a rampage.

episodes.title: Saikyou!! Gokuu ga Super Saiya-jin 4 ni!!
episodes.plot: Goku ascends to Super Saiyan 4 and fights Baby.

episodes.title: Fujimi no Kaibutsu!? Kyouaku Oozaru Baby
episodes.plot: Goku fights Great Ape Baby.

episodes.title: Souzetsu!! Baby to Gokuu Double KO!!
episodes.plot: Goku and Great Ape Baby knock each other out. While they are unconscious, Kibito Kai rushes to the Lookout so that he can retrieve the sacred water and use it to return everyone to normal.

episodes.title: Minna no Chikara de... Super Saiya-jin 4 Fukkatsu
episodes.plot: Restored to normal with the Sacred Water, Trunks, Gohan, and Goten show up just in time to help Goku in his fight with Baby.

episodes.title: Kore de Saigo Da! Tsui ni Baby Shoumetsu
episodes.plot: Restored to full power from the energy Trunks, Gohan, Goten, and Pan gave him, Goku fights Baby.

episodes.title: Chikyuu Bakuhatsu!! Piccolo no Juudai na Ketsui
episodes.plot: With Earth about to explode, the Z Fighters form a plan to evacuate every living creature to the new Planet Vegeta.

episodes.title: Tenkaichi Budoukai: Satan no Koukeisha wa Dare
episodes.plot: Start of the "Super 17 Saga". It is time again for the World Martial Arts Tournament. Goku, still in child form, fights in the Jr. Division, while Majuub (disguised as "Papaya Man") and Pan fight in the adult bracket. Also, Mr. Satan announces that he will retire from fighting after this year's tournament, Trunks announces his retirement as President of Capsule Corporation, and Vegeta attempts to enter the tournament late.

episodes.title: Shine Gokuu!! Jigoku kara Yomigaeru Kyouteki-tachi
episodes.plot: Dr. Gero and Dr. Myuu join forces in hell to take their revenge on Goku. Using two versions of Android 17, one in hell and one on Earth, they create an opening between the two dimensions. As old enemies return to terrorize the world again, Goku realizes that he must travel to hell to stop the evil doctors.

episodes.title: Jigoku no Masenshi! Cell & Freeza Fukkatsu
episodes.plot: Goku fights Cell and Frieza in hell. Back on Earth, Majuub, Trunks, and Goten fight a group of saibamen, Gohan fights General Rilldo, and Vegeta fights Android 17.

episodes.title: Kyuukyoku Jinzou-ningen! Futari no 17-gou Gattai
episodes.plot: In Hell, Goku continues to fight Cell and Frieza. On Earth, Android 18 fights Android 17 and Gohan continues fighting General Rilldo. Later, Vegeta, Majuub, Trunks, Gohan, and Goten all fight Super Android 17.

episodes.title: Isoge Gokuu!! Jigoku kara no Dasshutsu Daisakusen
episodes.plot: Piccolo and Dende try to converge their energy so that Goku can escape from hell while the other Z Fighters continue to fight Super Android 17 on Earth.

episodes.title: Gekitotsu!! Super Saiya-jin 4 vs. Super 17-gou
episodes.plot: Goku fights Super Android 17.

episodes.title: Daigyakuten! Gokuu to 18-gou no Nidan Kougeki Sakuretsu
episodes.plot: Goku continues to fight Super Android 17, and Android 18 shows up to help him.

episodes.title: Kore wa Bikkuri! Shenlong ga Teki ni?!
episodes.plot: Start of the "Shadow Dragon Saga". When the Z Fighters attempt to summon Shenron by using the cracked dragon balls, the shadow dragons, created from the negative energy formed from all of the previous wishes, escape. Once this is explained to them by the Kais, Goku goes after the dragons to stop them from destroying the Earth.

episodes.title: Saikyou no Teki?! Kyoufu no Urawaza o Tsukau Ryuu
episodes.plot: Goku and Pan fight Haze Shenron, the two star shadow dragon, who is using his powers to pollute the Earth.

episodes.title: Saiya Power Gyokusai!? Denkijuu Wuxinglong
episodes.plot: Goku and Pan fight Rage Shenron, the five star shadow dragon, who has absorbed all of the electricity in a city and caused its citizens to flee.

episodes.title: Liuxinglong! Daitatsumaki Kougeki no Jakuten o Sagase
episodes.plot: Goku and Pan fight Oceanus Shenron, the six star shadow dragon, who has corrupted a fishing village.

episodes.title: Pan Abunee! Qixinglong no Totte Oki
episodes.plot: Goku and Pan fight Naturon Shenron, the seven star shadow dragon, who is causing earthquakes.

episodes.title: Pan ga Shoumetsu!? Namida no 10-bai Kamehameha
episodes.plot: Goku continues to fight Naturon Shenron, who is now using Pan's body to give him power.

episodes.title: Sesshi 6000-do no Power! Taiyou no Senshi
episodes.plot: Goku fights Nuova Shenron, the four star shadow dragon.

episodes.title: Bulma Ugoku! Vegeta Kaizou Keikaku
episodes.plot: As Vegeta thinks back on how Goku has always been one step ahead of him no matter what he did, good or bad, Bulma formulates a plan to help Vegeta ascend to Super Saiyan 4.

episodes.title: Taiyou no Tsugi wa Gokkan! Honoo to Koori no Kyoudai Ryuu
episodes.plot: Goku continues to fight Nuova Shenron until Nuova's brother, Eis Shenron, the three star shadow dragon, shows up to cause trouble for both of them.

episodes.title: Tsuyosa Attouteki!! Jaaku Ryuu o Shihai Suru Ryuu
episodes.plot: Goku fights Eis Shenron and Syn Shenron, the one star shadow dragon.

episodes.title: Hangeki Kaishi! Super Saiya-jin 4 o Koero
episodes.plot: Gohan, Goten, Trunks, and Majuub arrive to power up the depleted Goku, who continues to fight Syn Shenron.

episodes.title: Teki ka Mikata ka... Oozaru Vegeta Ooabare
episodes.plot: Goku fights Omega Shenron, the unified form of all seven shadow dragons.

episodes.title: Fusion!! Kyuukyoku no Super Gogeta
episodes.plot: Realizing that they are no match for Omega Shenron even when they are both at Super Saiyan 4, Goku and Vegeta perform fusion, and, as Gogeta, they fight Omega Shenron.

episodes.title: Zettai Katsu zo! Sixingqiu o Kutta Gokuu
episodes.plot: Their fusion having worn off quicker than expected, Goku and Vegeta separately fight Omega Shenron.

episodes.title: Gokuu o Sukue! Saigo no Mikata Toujou
episodes.plot: Nuova Shenron re-emerges from the four star dragon ball, and he helps Goku and Vegeta fight Omega Shenron.

episodes.title: Kiseki no Gyakuten Shouri!! Uchuu o Sukutta Gokuu
episodes.plot: Drained of power, Goku, Vegeta, Gohan, Goten, and Trunks make their last stand against Omega Shenron as the Earth collapses around them.

episodes.title: Saraba Gokuu... Mata Au Hi made
episodes.plot: After Shenron restores the lives of everyone who has been killed recently, he invites Goku to go with him. Before they leave Earth, Goku says farewell to his friends and family, who reminisce about their time together.
